14 #include <nav_msgs/Odometry.h>
15 #include <geometry_msgs/PoseWithCovarianceStamped.h>
16 
17 ros::Publisher initialPosePublisher;
18 
19 void odomCallback(const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr& odomMsg) {
20  // Create a message to publish to /initialpose
21  geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped initialPoseMsg;
22 
23  // Extract relevant data from the odomMsg and set it in initialPoseMsg
24  initialPoseMsg.pose.pose = odomMsg->pose.pose;
25 
26  // Publish the initial pose message
27  initialPosePublisher.publish(initialPoseMsg);
28 
29  // Unsubscribe after receiving one message
30  ros::topic::waitForMessage<nav_msgs::Odometry>("/odom", ros::Duration(1.0)); // Wait for one message
31  ros::shutdown();
32 }

45 
46 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
47  ros::init(argc, argv, "odom_to_initialpose");
48  ros::NodeHandle nh;
49  // Create a publisher for the /initialpose topic
50  initialPosePublisher = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped>("/initialpose", 1);
51  // Spin to process incoming messages
52  ros::spinOnce(); // Process messages once
53  return 0;
54 }
